newsitem.title: JAPAN: Dollar dips below 123 yen but soon rises in Tokyo.
newsitem.headline: Dollar dips below 123 yen but soon rises in Tokyo.

text.p: 0212 GMT --*Dollar slid against yen in morning Tokyo, falling as far as around 122.92 yen, lowest in over one month. *Dealers said near-term support may be around 122.80 yen, but further downside risk still remains. *Some hedge sales by trust banks detected, but importer bids and U.S. banks' purchases soon pushed greenback above 123 yen again.
